actions.committee: Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.subcommittee: the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: To prohibit entities from using Federal funds to contribute to political campaigns or participate in lobbying activities.
short_title: No Taxpayer Money for Corporate Campaigns Act of 2010

summary.text: No Taxpayer Money for Corporate Campaigns Act of 2010 - Prohibits: (1) the use of federal funds received by any entity, other than a natural person, to advocate the election or defeat of a political candidate or to engage in any lobbying activity; or (2) the donation of such funds to any other entity for such purposes.

titles.title: No Taxpayer Money for Corporate Campaigns Act of 2010
To prohibit entities from using Federal funds to contribute to political campaigns or participate in lobbying activities.
